channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What CEOs really think of Trump’s tariffs
item.description: Also: Activist investor warns of crypto bubble, Dell shuts off remote work.

item.title: UBS sticks to S&P 500 target for end of 2025. 'Tariffs unlikely to be sustained'
What Blackstone looks for in a CEO for its companies
item.description: Blackstone follows a strict playbook to evaluate potential portfolio company CEO candidates, assessing their prospects for success and failure.

item.title: Tom Lee gives 5 reasons to buy the dip after tariff turmoil
JPMorgan says Trump administration may be 'business-unfriendly'
Immigrant applicants left to navigate courts alone as DOJ tells nonprofit aid groups ‘to stop work immediately’
item.description: Donald Trump previously targeted these programs during his first term, but this time things are different.

item.title: FX strategist sees tariffs at 'most hawkish end of protectionist spectrum'
VW is most exposed of automakers to tariffs. Here's the impact on GM and Ford.
Elon Musk says he’s teaming up with Jamie Dimon to convince bond markets that cost-cutting DOGE is good for U.S. debt
item.description: Dimon and Musk's collaboration comes just weeks after Dimon offered to help the billionaire with his government cost-cutting initiative.

item.title: Trump’s tariff threats were not taken seriously and markets completely under-priced the risks, says Deutsche Bank strategist says
item.description: Deutsche Bank has a wake up call for analysts who denied Trump would deliver on tax rhetoric—but UBS is questioning how quickly the White House may re...
